channel.title: DragonBall Z Abridged
channel.description: Not sure if any of you have seen it, but... http://www.teamfourstar.com/page-episodes In my opinion you should start at episode 7 and work your way up. Skip everything besides the stuff labeled episodes. And the Nappatisement. :cool: So, What's your opinion on it? Funny, stupid, boring? What?

item.title: DragonBall Z Abridged
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:18, topic:378575”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=474444.msg3469909#msg3469909 date=1295211866]
What year was it that you watched it? You probably watched it while they were still making them. I was born in 97, and since I was 8 watching them, it was 2005. That might be where they randomized it.
[/quote]
97. Your young. Haha.

What year was it that you watched it? You probably watched it while they were still making them. I was born in 97, and since I was 8 watching them, it was 2005. That might be where they randomized it.

I was born in 94, watched them between 99-01. I only remember this because I started RuneScape the year I stopped watching it.

This is about when I watched them. They were the shit back then. I remember running around thinking I was a super saiyan. Hamekame AH! :D[/quote]
FUCKIN MORON IT WAS KAMEHAME AH GET IT RIGHT
and according to my profile, I’m 800 years old. So you’re the young one, silly goose.

Read full topic

item.title: DragonBall Z Abridged
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:14, topic:378575”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=474444.msg3469804#msg3469804 date=1295207822]

I’ve never liked DragonBall Z. It always seemed too confusing. Then again, I was 8.

Is your brain the size of a peanut, oh yeah you were 8? but i understanded it since i was like 7 years old. its a good show :rolleyes:

No, Cartoon Network never played it in sequence. And they all have fucking blond hair that goes about 2 feet in the air and muscles and they can fly.

Is your brain the size of a peanut
understanded

I’m sorry if CARTOONS (Anime) is too unrealistic for you. Why don’t you go watch some soap operas or something. DragonBall Z was an action anime meant for the more easily excited kids rather than the kids who liked less action-typed cartoon/animes
[/quote][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=474444.msg3469755#msg3469755 date=1295206347]
No, Cartoon Network never played it in sequence.
[/quote][/quote][quote=“Cole1497, post:12, topic:378575”][size=18pt]No, Cartoon Network never played it in sequence.[/size][/quote]
[/quote]

It actually did. You probably just didn’t realize it.

They had a lot of fillers, however.

Read full topic
